entry.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine accounts maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 6, 18:00 - 23:00 UTC

Mar 1, 12:50 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 06/03/2024 18:00 UTC
End time : 06/03/2024 23:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade; however, at one point, a short downtime of no more than 10 minutes will be experienced. Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on account service. This maintenance is expected to not have impact on the projects: no downtime, no performance issue are expected.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][VoIP] - SMS delivery status incident notification
entry.content:
Mar 1, 15:42 UTC
Update - Some of the sms affected by the incident have not yet received their acknowledgements of receipt.
Our teams are working to reintegrate the sms whose acknowledgements of receipt are still in error.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Feb 29, 16:06 UTC
Update - Our provider implemented the definitive patch and fixed the issue.
SMS received by the customers have their status updated to delivered.
Our teams are currently working on integrating the delivered status that has not been received.

Feb 29, 10:31 UTC
Update - The patch that has been implemented has considerably reduced the impact and DLRs (delivery reporting) are in the process of being inserted.

Feb 28, 16:26 UTC
Identified - Start time : 23/02/2024 17:15 UTC
Service impact : Customers are receiving SMS but some SMS delivery status is not updated as delivered
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently working with our provider to solve the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [Global][Web Cloud] - Hosted Exchange incident notification
entry.content:
Feb 23, 10:21 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.
Start time : 16/02/2024 16:59 UTC
End time : 23/02/2024 10:21 UTC

Feb 21, 11:08 UTC
Monitoring - Dear Customer,

The Microsoft Outlook product is facing an issue that could generate an authentication process for some accounts. This issue is related to an additional security feature called Extended Protection that was enabled after the last security update to mitigate the vulnerability described in CVE-2024-21410.

Microsoft's current recommendation in this case is to add a registry key as described at https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/exchange/plan-and-deploy/post-installation-tasks/security-best-practices/exchange-extended-protection?view=exchserver-2019#ntlm-version-requirements.

We hope that this will help you to resolve the issue if you are affected.

Feb 20, 18:28 UTC
Update - The fix did not produce the expected results, customers are recommended to update Outlook client to the latest version or to apply a registry key to use the correct NTLM protocol : NTLM version requirements.
Our teams are continuing to work on a fix.

Feb 19, 16:22 UTC
Update - Our technical teams will implement a fix during the night.
An update will be posted as soon as significant progress is made.

Feb 19, 15:30 UTC
Update - Our teams have identified the source of the connection problem. There are two workarounds:
- The first workaround is to update your Outlook client to the latest version.
- The second workaround is to apply a registry key to use the correct NTLM protocol : NTLM version requirements

Our technical teams are continuing to work on this issue.
An update will be issued as soon as significant progress is made.

Feb 19, 13:06 UTC
Update - Our technical teams are continuing to work on this issue.
An update will be issued as soon as significant progress is made.

Feb 19, 10:59 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Feb 19, 09:34 UTC
Identified - Start time : 16/02/2024 16:59 UTC
Service impact : Customers may face problems with connexion, only outlook is concerned.
Root cause : Following a fix implemented to resolve this incident https://web-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/7vfj2lp3jdkd, some customers may experience connection problems for outlook accounts.
Ongoing actions : A fix in progress.
